Uses of Package
org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds

  • Packages that use org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds 
    Package Description
    org.yamcs.tctm  
    org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds  
  • Classes in org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds used by org.yamcs.tctm 
    Class and Description
    AbstractTcFrameLink
    Sends TC as TC frames (CCSDS 232.0-B-3) or TC frames embedded in CLTU (CCSDS 231.0-B-3).
  • Classes in org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds used by org.yamcs.tctm.ccsds 
    Class and Description
    AosManagedParameters 
    AosTransferFrame
    AOS Transfer Frame as per CCSDS RECOMMENDED STANDARD FOR AOS SPACE DATA LINK PROTOCOL CCSDS 732.0-B-3 September 2015 Primary Header is composed of Transfer frame version number (2 bits) - shall be set to 01 Spacecraft id (8 bits) Virtual Channel id (6 bits) Virtual Channel frame count (24 bits) replay flag (1 bit) VC frame count usage flag (1 bit) spare (2 bits) VC frame count cycle frame header error control (optional)
    DownlinkManagedParameters
    Stores configuration related to Master channels for downlink.
    DownlinkManagedParameters.FrameErrorCorrection 
    DownlinkTransferFrame
    Transfer frame is an interface covering the three CCSDS transfer frames types: TM (CCSDS 132.0-B-2) AOS (CCSDS 732.0-B-3) UNIFIED ( 732.1-B-1) All three of them have the following structure: Primary Header Insert Zone/Secondary Header Data Field Operational Control Field (OCF) Error Control Field Note that for USLP, the data field has also a header.
    MasterChannelFrameMultiplexer
    Multiplexes TC frames from Virtual Channels based on priority schemes.
    TcFrameFactory 
    TcManagedParameters
    Parameters used for generation of TC frames as per CCSDS 232.0-B-3
    TcManagedParameters.MultiplexingScheme 
    TcManagedParameters.TcVcManagedParameters 
    TcTransferFrame 
    TmManagedParameters 
    TmTransferFrame 
    TransferFrameDecoder 
    TransferFrameDecoder.CcsdsFrameType 
    UplinkManagedParameters
    Stores configuration related to Master channels for uplink.
    UplinkManagedParameters.FrameErrorCorrection 
    UplinkManagedParameters.ServiceType 
    UslpManagedParameters 
    VcDownlinkHandler
    Called from the MasterChannelFrameHandler to handle TM frames for a specific virtual channel.
    VcDownlinkManagedParameters
    Stores configuration related to Virtual Channels
    VcUplinkHandler
    Handlers uplink data in a virtual channel
    VcUplinkManagedParameters
    Stores configuration related to Virtual Channels for uplink
